I wonder how many people on this list actual read this
story but anyhow.... 

Chapter 27 is up. Finally. And it was a nightmare. I'm
expecting brutal criticism, more from the Shinsengumi
fans than the RK fans (who don't seem all that too
keen on the Shinsengumi history stuff) and especially
from Itou fans. 

I apologize in advance for any mangling of characters
and defamation. I have been fortunate that nobody has
ever seen fit to flame me, but in a masochistic way,
I'm kinda curious as to what it would feel like, so
I'm inviting all comments, criticisms as well as
flames. 

Best wishes, 

Mio, who should probably crawl under a metaphorical
rock.
